nodes.name: L-Glutamate:ammonia ligase (ADP-forming)
nodes.rxn: ATP + L-Glutamate + Ammonia <=> ADP + Orthophosphate + L-Glutamine
nodes.gene: pae:PA0296 pae:PA0298 pae:PA1566 pae:PA2040 pae:PA3356 pae:PA5119 pae:PA5508 pae:PA5522

nodes.name: ATP:carbamate phosphotransferase
nodes.rxn: ATP + Ammonia + HCO3- <=> ADP + Carbamoyl phosphate + H2O

nodes.name: Carbon-dioxide:ammonia ligase (ADP-forming,carbamate-phosphorylating)
nodes.rxn: 2 ATP + Ammonia + CO2 + H2O <=> 2 ADP + Orthophosphate + Carbamoyl phosphate

nodes.name: L-Citrulline:L-aspartate ligase (AMP-forming)
nodes.rxn: ATP + L-Citrulline + L-Aspartate <=> AMP + Diphosphate + N-(L-Arginino)succinate

nodes.name: N-acetyl-L-glutamate-5-semialdehyde:NADP+ 5-oxidoreductase (phosphrylating)
nodes.rxn: N-Acetyl-L-glutamate 5-semialdehyde + Orthophosphate + NADP+ <=> N-Acetyl-L-glutamate 5-phosphate + NADPH + H+

nodes.name: Urea:carbon-dioxide ligase (ADP-forming)
nodes.rxn: ATP + Urea + HCO3- <=> ADP + Orthophosphate + Urea-1-carboxylate

nodes.name: L-arginine,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (nitric-oxide-forming)
nodes.rxn: 2 L-Arginine + 4 Oxygen + 3 NADPH + 3 H+ <=> 2 Nitric oxide + 2 L-Citrulline + 3 NADP+ + 4 H2O

nodes.name: L-glutamate:NAD+ oxidoreductase (deaminating)
nodes.rxn: L-Glutamate + NAD+ + H2O <=> 2-Oxoglutarate + Ammonia + NADH + H+

nodes.name: L-glutamate:NAD+ oxidoreductase (deaminating)
nodes.rxn: L-Glutamate + NAD+ + H2O <=> 2-Oxoglutarate + Ammonia + NADH + H+

nodes.name: L-glutamate:NADP+ oxidoreductase (deaminating)
nodes.rxn: L-Glutamate + NADP+ + H2O <=> 2-Oxoglutarate + Ammonia + NADPH + H+

nodes.name: L-arginine,reduced-flavodoxin:oxygen oxidoreductase (nitric-oxide-forming)
nodes.rxn: 2 L-Arginine + 3 Reduced flavodoxin + 4 Oxygen <=> 2 L-Citrulline + 2 Nitric oxide + 3 Oxidized flavodoxin + 4 H2O

nodes.name: LysW:L-glutamate ligase (ADP-forming)
nodes.rxn: L-Glutamate + alpha-Aminoadipate carrier protein LysW + ATP <=> LysW-L-glutamate + ADP + Orthophosphate

nodes.name: LysW-L-glutamate-5-semialdehyde:NADP+ 5-oxidoreductase (phosphorylating)
nodes.rxn: LysW-L-glutamyl 5-phosphate + NADPH + H+ <=> LysW-L-glutamate 5-semialdehyde + NADP+ + Orthophosphate

nodes.name: LysW-L-ornithine amidohydrolase
nodes.rxn: LysW-L-ornithine + H2O <=> L-Ornithine + alpha-Aminoadipate carrier protein LysW
